channel.title: Post on Darrick Sturgeon
channel.description: Recent content in Post on Darrick Sturgeon

item.title: GMMs: visualization using PCA
item.description: data <- iris[, !(names(iris) %in% c('Species'))] mvn <- mvnormalmixEM(data, k = 3) number of iterations= 34 pca <- prcomp(data, scale=TRUE, center=TRUE) mat <- pca$rotation
